alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT THURSDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Excessive runoff from earlier heavy rainfall will continue to cause some flooding problems of rural roads. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Kansas, including the following county, Greenwood. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1140 PM CDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding of some rural roads due to excessive runoff from earlier heavy rainfall in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... The town of Madison and rural areas in the northern part of Greenwood county.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
